entries.journal_entry_description: Craft gloves for the Marauder smith.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Craft three pairs of Mabari armor gloves.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Craft three pairs of Bone armor gloves.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Craft three pairs of Composite armor gloves.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Craft all three pairs of gloves.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Macchbraus with the gloves.
